channel.title: Containers on Anshul Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Containers on Anshul Patel

item.title: Safeguard Software Supply Chain
item.description: My meetup talk discusses about safeguarding the software supply chain via SLSA framework and SBOM.

item.title: Docker Fundamentals
item.description: This article provides introduction to Docker, how it differs from Virtual Machine and underlining technologies.

item.title: Docker Notary
item.description: My meetup talk discusses about securely distributing docker images in Software Supply Chain using Docker Notary.

item.title: LinuxKit
item.description: My meetup talk discusses about how to build immutable operating systems [Unikernels] with LinuxKit.

item.title: Container Cluster Management with AWS ECS
item.description: My meetup talk discusses about basics of Docker containers and how to orchestrate the containers at scale using AWS ECS.
